Damage Dealer.description: Damage Dealer: Excels at dealing damage, increasing final damage by 3%.

Burst Damage.description: Burst Striker: Specialises in delivering high burst damage in a short period through skills.

Multi-Target.description: Area Damage Dealer: Excels at dealing Area of Effect (AOE) damage to multiple enemies.

Tank.description: Guardian: Positioned in the front row to absorb damage, reducing damage taken by 5%.

Control.description: Controller: Capable of controlling enemies through crowd-control effects.

Sustained.description: Sustainer: Inflicts special effects and engages in prolonged combat.

Buff.description: Buffer: Provides beneficial buffs to enhance teammates’ performance.

Healer.description: Healer: Specialises in healing, enhancing healing effects by 5%.

Single Target.description: Precision Striker: Focuses on dealing high damage to a single enemy.

Support.description: Supporter: Offers strategic support by increasing teammates’ maximum health by 5%.

Debuff.description: Debuffer: Specialises in weakening enemies by applying debuffs.

Summoner.description: Summoner: Capable of summoning additional units to assist in battle.
